body: Certain components in your vehicle such as airbag modules, seatbelt pretensioners and remote control batteries may contain perchlorate material.  Special handling may apply for service or vehicle end of life disposal.
contentHtml: Certain components in your vehicle such as airbag modules, seatbelt pretensioners and remote control batteries may contain perchlorate material.  Special handling may apply for service or vehicle end of life disposal.
title: Perchlorate
